titles: A proclamacion setfurth by thee Kynges Maiesty wyth the aduise of hys moost honorable Counsaill, for the aduoydyng of ydle persones out of the citie of London.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
Below imprint: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
keywords: Rogues and vagabonds --  Early works to 1800.
London (England) --  Social conditions --  Early works to 1800.
